divs: Sighting Detailstriangle flew straight over me and my friend approximatly 200 feet high. moveing approximatly 25 mph. also orbs appearing to move slowly then stop then move away at great speeds.also what looks like laser beams in the night sky.I also saw in the day time two white sphere like objects joined by a straight line.All of these sightings have been observed in the months of nov. and december on every clear night.
